text: allāh – avana horatu pūjege ar'haru bērārū illa. Avanu sadā jīvantanu, ellara niyantrakanu. Tūkaḍikeyāgali niddeyāgali avanannu bādhisuvudilla. Ākāśagaḷalliruva mattu bhūmiyalliruva ellavū avanadē. Avana munde, avana appaṇe illade śiphārasu māḍaballavaru yāru? Avara (janara) mundiruva mattu avara hindiruva ellavannū avanu ballanu. Avana jñānada yāva anśavannū grahisalu avarige sādhyavilla – avanē icchisuvaṣṭara horatu. Avana adhikāra pīṭhavu ākāśagaḷannu mattu bhūmiyannu āvariside. Avugaḷa sanrakṣaṇeya kelasavu avanannu daṇisuvudilla. Mattu avanu atyunnatanū, mahānanū āgiddāne
